code: function makeFadeOutTranslation(translationType,toValue){return{from:{opacity:1,[translationType]:0},to:{opacity:0,[translationType]:toValue}};}export const fadeOut={from:{opacity:1},to:{opacity:0}};export const fadeOutDown=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateY',100);export const fadeOutUp=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateY',-100);export const fadeOutLeft=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateX',-100);export const fadeOutRight=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateX',100);export const fadeOutDownBig=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateY',500);export const fadeOutUpBig=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateY',-500);export const fadeOutLeftBig=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateX',-500);export const fadeOutRightBig=makeFadeOutTranslation('translateX',500);
